<div class="talk-card">
  <h3>Introduction to Computational Complexity and Turing Machines</h3>
  <p class="talk-meta">Speaker: Rudrayan Kundu, MStat 1st Year
  <p class="talk-abstract">
    In this talk we give a brief introduction to the models of computation and Turing Machines and how that does not matter.
    We define the classes P and NP based on our definition of deterministic turing machines.

  <h3>NP-Completeness Crash Session</h3>
  <p class="talk-meta">Speaker: NAME · Level: Intermediate</p>
  <p class="talk-abstract">
